DOC.brief_title: Randomized AmnioFix Study During Radical Prostatectomy

DOC.criteria: 1 . Male subject age 3575 2 . Primary diagnosis prostate cancer select surgical intervention one six protocol surgeon ( Chapin , Davis , Matin , Pettaway , Pisters , Ward ) . 3 . Have willingness comply followup HRQOL ( health relate quality life ) survey PSA assessment . 4 . Have ability provide full write consent . 5 . Primary diagnosis untreated clinically localized prostate cancer Gleason score 6 , 7,8 9 . 6 . Planned elective radical prostatectomy bilateral nerve spar technique include high low fascia . 7 . Negative urinalysis within 30 day prior date surgery 1 . Highrisk cancer plan neoadjuvant therapy , full partial excision one neurovascular bundle . 2 . Has condition ( ) , seriously compromise subject 's ability participate study , sign consent , know history poor adherence medical treatment . 3 . Is unable comply learn document penile rehabilitation , include oral 5phosphodiesterase inhibitor use , vacuum pump therapy use , and/or injectable medication . 4 . In opinion PI , history drug alcohol abuse within last 12 month . 5 . Is allergic Aminoglycoside antibiotic ( Gentamicin and/or Streptomycin ) . 6 . Patients history two week treatment immunosuppressant ( include systemic corticosteroid ) , cytotoxic chemotherapy within one month prior initial screening , receive medication screen period , anticipated require medication course study . 7 . Patients currently enrol another study . Concurrent enrollment another study prohibit expect control arm use protocol HRQOL endpoint similar instrument . 8 .
